charges.charge_disposition: to TIME SERVED, w/1 year supervised release &; while on spr rel, no FSL crimes, No drugs/controlled substances and stand conditions 1-15 are imposed. Spec cond: Financial counseling as directed by USPO until release, be employed full-time or pursue higher education program as approved by USPO, 100 hours community service during 1st 6 months of supervised release in event dft is released or acquitted on charges pending in Colorado. Subj to random search of person, home, vehicle, work or as directed by USPO. Crt finds dft atlow risk for substance abuse which condition is suspended. no fine, &; special assesesment is due immed of $25.00. No obj to jdgmnt as stated; USA has a detainer pending from ST of Colorado. (2)
